title: Hero MotoCorp sees 26% jump in festive rural sales
description: Hero MotoCorp, India's largest two-wheeler maker, witnessed a 26% growth in its secondary network, primarily based in tier II and III cities and rural areas, during the 42-day festive period ending on November 15. The company reported an overall 20% YoY increase in sales, reaching a record 1.4 million units during the festive season.
